title: Help : What is this font
content:

comments.content: Thank you in advance for your help

It really is ITC Handel Gothic Std Heavy Italic.  
 [www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/handel-gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011002502/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/handel-gothic "www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/handel-gothic")
